pkgmetadata.longdescription: Validate Instrumental Variables using NPS // An R implementation of the Necessary and Probably Sufficient (NPS) test for finding valid instrumental variables, as suggested by Amit Sharma (2016, Working Paper) http://amitsharma.in/pubs/necessary_proba bly_sufficient_iv_test.pdf. The NPS test, compares the likelihood that a given set of observational data of the three variables Z, X and Y is generated by a valid instrumental variable model (Z - X - Y) to the likelihood that the data is generated by an invalid IV model.
